search-engine-default-private-desc-2.string: Choose a different default search engine for Ghost Mode only

label.string: Use this search engine in Ghost Mode

search-show-suggestions-private-windows.string: Show search suggestions in Ghost Mode

history-dontremember-description.string: { -brand-short-name } will use the same settings in Ghost Mode, and will not remember any history as you browse the Web.

sitedata-delete-on-close-private-browsin.string: In permanent Ghost Mode, cookies and site data will always be cleared when { -brand-short-name } is closed.

httpsonly-radio-enabled-pbm.string: Enable HTTPS-Only Mode in Ghost Mode only

identity-custom-root.string: 인증서 발행자가 확인한 연결이 { -brand-short-name }에서 인식되지 않습니다.

identity-description-custom-root.string: { -brand-short-name }에서 이 인증서 발행자를 인식하지 않습니다. 사용자의 운영 체제 또는 관리자가 추가한 것일 수 있습니다. <label data-l10n-name="link">자세히 알아보기</label>

label.string: Set as Default Search Engine for Ghost Mode

about-logins-login-intro-heading-logged-.string: 저장된 로그인 정보를 찾고 계신가요? 정보를 불러올 수 있습니다.

about-logins-intro-import.string: 로그인 정보가 다른 브라우저에서 저장된 경우 정보를 불러올 수 있습니다

about-private-browsing-info-title.string: You’re Now Veiled in Ghost Mode

about-private-browsing-info-myths.string: Note that Ghost mode does not make you anonymous to websites, your internet service provider, and other third parties. Learn More

about-private-browsing-not-private.string: You are currently not in a Ghost Mode window.

about-private-browsing-search-banner-tit.string: { $engineName } is your default search engine in Ghost Mode

about-private-browsing-info-description.string: In Ghostery’s private browsing mode, your activity will be kept confidential from others who use this device. The following will be automatically erased from Ghostery Dawn at the end of this session: Browsing historySearch historyCookiesDownload historyHowever, files you download will be retained by your device and pages you bookmark will be saved.

main-context-menu-open-link-new-private-.string: Open Link in New Ghost Mode Window

places-open-private-window.string: Open in a New Ghost Mode Window

privatebrowsing-button.tooltiptext.string: Open a new Ghost Mode window (%S)

detail-private-disallowed-label.string: Not Allowed in Ghost Mode Windows

detail-private-disallowed-description2.string: This extension does not run while in Ghost Mode. Learn more

detail-private-required-label.string: Requires Access to Ghost Mode Windows

detail-private-required-description2.string: This extension has access to your online activities while in Ghost Mode. Learn more

private-browsing-description2.string:
{ -brand-short-name } is changing how extensions work in Ghost Mode. Any new extensions you add to
{ -brand-short-name } won’t run by default in Ghost Mode Windows. Unless you allow it in settings, the
extension won’t work while in Ghost Mode, and won’t have access to your online activities
there. We’ve made this change to keep your Ghost Mode browsing private.
<label data-l10n-name="private-browsing-learn-more">Learn how to manage extension settings</label>

addon-detail-private-browsing-help.string: When allowed, the extension will have access to your online activities while in Ghost Mode. Learn more

appmenu-update-restart-message.string: After a quick restart, { -brand-shorter-name } will restore all your open tabs and windows that are not in Ghost Mode.

label.string: Allow this extension to run in Ghost Mode

newtab-menu-open-new-private-window.string: Open in a New Ghost Mode Window

leavePrivateBrowsingWindowsCancelDownloa.string: If you close all Ghost Mode windows now, 1 download will be canceled. Are you sure you want to leave Ghost Mode?
If you close all Ghost Mode windows now, %S downloads will be canceled. Are you sure you want to leave Ghost Mode?

performanceUI.unavailableNoticePB.string: Recording a profile is currently unavailable. Please close all Ghost Mode windows and try again.

tabs.closeWarningMultipleSessionRestore2.string: ;You are about to close #1 tabs. Tabs in non-Ghost Mode windows will be restored when you restart. Are you sure you want to continue?

tabs.closeWarningMultipleWindowsSessionR.string: ;You are about to close #1 windows %S. Tabs in non-Ghost Mode windows will be restored when you restart. Are you sure you want to continue?

ServiceWorkerRegisterStorageError.string: Failed to register/update a ServiceWorker for scope ‘%S’: Storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Ghost Mode.

ServiceWorkerGetRegistrationStorageError.string: Failed to get service worker registration(s): Storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Ghost Mode.

ServiceWorkerGetClientStorageError.string: Failed to get service worker’s client(s): Storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Ghost Mode.

ServiceWorkerPostMessageStorageError.string: The ServiceWorker for scope ‘%S’ failed to execute ‘postMessage‘ because storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Ghost Mode.

RegisterProtocolHandlerPrivateBrowsingWa.string: Can’t use registerProtocolHandler inside Ghost Mode.

taskbar.tasks.newPrivateWindow.descripti.string: Open a new window in Ghost Mode.
